content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > you are very welcome to join the sweet > bee crochet facebook group share > project photos and connect with other > crocheters in a positive and > encouraging environment click > here 1 say hello to the happy gatherings coaster using a small amount of worsted weight cotton yarn this pattern is a quick project with a cute criss-cross accent in the middle you can make a set for your table or simply make one or two for other uses like placing under plant pots to protect table surfaces this coaster is a companion piece to the happy gatherings table runner 2 **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - special stitch tutorials - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 15 yards of worsted cotton yarn per coaster - 4mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape *this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products * 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //sweetbeecrochet com/crochet-table-runner/
